title: [SOLVED]a1286 restarts when told to shut down
message:
hi guys,
                      a1286 restarts when selected shutdown . what area i should be looking into.
kindly advise 
thanks

title: [SOLVED]a1286 restarts when told to shut down
message: A1286 tells me nothing 2008-2012 about 5 different models. Liquid damage? Usually LAN chip or airport. PRAM reset done?

title: [SOLVED]a1286 restarts when told to shut down
message:
hi , 
 it was 820-2850 . thanks for the reply as you pointed correctly i found liquid damage around lan ic . working fine now . 
thanks again . you can mark it solved .
